metadata.title: CVE-2016-7511 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the dwarf_die_deliv.c in libdwarf 20160613 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7511` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
